EmailTemplate.description: Respond to a request for additional information. Attach application form.
EmailTemplate.name: P66 App With Info
EmailTemplate.subject: Here Is The Information You Requested
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I received your request for additional information on our Phillips 66 Fuel Card program. Please take a few minutes to look through the accompanying information. I’m confident that you’ll find the widely accepted WEX Fuel Card the one-card solution for all your fueling needs.
- We save you money. Robust fuel rebates every time you fuel up at a Phillips 66, Conoco and 76 location.
- We save you time. You’ll enjoy the convenience of a single fueling card program and one, easy-to-read invoice. You can also easily download transaction data from the web right to QuickBooks or Excel each month.
- We give you control. Detailed reports show how and where fueling money was spent, so you can account for every penny.
- We make it convenient. Your drivers only need to carry one card to fuel at any participating location.
You will find a complete list of accepting locations at http://www.phillips66gas.com/locations/.
It’s easy to enroll. Simply complete the attached application form and fax it back to me at {!User.Fax}.
Thank you for your interest in the Phillips 66 Fuel Card program.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} Fax - {!User.Fax}
{!User.Email}
